name: Tunnel Runner (itch) (AwakeEntertainment)
description:
Tunnel Runner Early Access

You wake. It's dark. Where are you ? All you know is that you want to get out of there. There are four doors, but only one is open. Go through the door  and the adventure begins. SURVIVE ! 

Tunnel Runner is a 3D dungeon survival game that makes the player be careful and consider every move thay make. Tunnels are full of traps. You see them, but you can't always avoid them. Will you get out ? Will you be free ? It is all up to you ! But the main question remains. When you get out, will it be over ? Let the game begin !
